set(TS_PROJECT_FILES
    ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/resources/i18n/LibreCelik_sr_RS.ts
    ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/resources/i18n/LibreCelik_en.ts
CACHE INTERNAL "ts_project_files")
set(RESOURSE_FILE ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/resources/librecelik.qrc CACHE INTERNAL "resource_file")

# The MACOSX_BUNDLE_ICON_FILE variable is added to the Info.plist generated by CMake.
# This variable contains the .icns file name, without the path.
set(MACOSX_BUNDLE_ICON_FILE "smartcard-id.icns" CACHE INTERNAL "app_bundle_icon_macos")
# And the following tells CMake where to find and install the file itself.
set(APP_ICON_MACOS "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/resources/smartcard-id.icns" CACHE INTERNAL "app_icon_macos")
# App icon
set(APP_ICON "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/resources/smartcard-id-512.png" CACHE INTERNAL "app_icon")
